Title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
Writer: Farhan Akhtar (dialogue), Reema Kagti (story), Zoya Akhtar (story), Reema Kagti (screenplay), Zoya Akhtar (screenplay), Shubham Ghude (story editor)
Actors: Hrithik Roshan, Farhan Akhtar, Abhay Deol, Katrina Kaif
Plot: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.
Production: UTV, Eros International Film Productions, Kanzaman, Excel Entertainment
